title: Tour de France 2021 Standings after Stage 12
content:
General Classification / Yellow Jersey 

The General Classification stayed the same today after all the big contenders finished in the main peloton over 15 minutes behind the day's eventual stage winner Nils Politt.

1. Tadej Pogačar
2. Rigoberto Uran +5:18
3. Jonas Vingegaard +5:32
4. Richard Carapaz +5:32
5. Ben O'Connor +5:58
6. Wilco Kelderman +6:16
7. Alexey Lutsenko +6:30
8. Enric Mas +7:11
9. Guillaume Martin +9:29
10. Pello Bibao +10:28

Tour de France 2021 Guide

Points Classification / Green Jersey

Mark Cavendish still leads the points classification for Deceuninck Quick-Step. He didn't feature in the intermediate sprint of the day, but sprinted in the bunch kick behind the breakaway to take 2 points ahead of his rivals.

1. Mark Cavendish - 218 points
2. Michael Matthews - 160 points
3. Jasper Philipsen - 136 points
4. Sonny Colbrelli - 138 points
5. Julian Alaphilippe - 119 points

The Tour de France jerseys – the race so far

King of the Mountains Classification / Polka-Dot Jersey

Quintana retains his lead in the KOM Classification.

1. Nairo Quintana - 50 points
2. Wout van Aert - 43 points
3. Michael Woods - 42 points
4. Wout Poels - 39 points
5. Bauke Mollema - 36 points

Young Rider's Classification / White Jersey

The Young Rider's Classification stays the same today after a bunch finish.

1. Tadej Pogačar
2. Jonas Vingegaard +5:32
3. Aurélien Paret-Peintre +24:44
4. Sergio Higuita +54:41
5. Mark Donovan +01:18:23

Team Classification

1. Bahrain Victorious
2. AG2R Citroën +18:04
3. Ineos Grenadiers +27:33
4. Astana - Premier Tech +34:01
5. EF Education - Nippo +42:38

Cover image: A.S.O./Pauline Ballet
author: Peter Stuart
